title: Ep. 278 "Thornbacks"
description:
Thornback-'An old, single, never-married woman over 26. A spinster; i.e she's so old she graduated from a spinster to a thornback.'  Is this life?

Get Tickets to Our Live Show!

City Winery Atlanta- Get Tickets Here

***As of right now you must be fully vaccinated.  It is the venue's rule not ours.  Check their website for the most up to date COVID-19 policies"

Love Potion Recipe:

COCKTAIL: LOVE POTION

1 OZ SWEETENED LIME JUICE

2 OZ RASPBERRY VODKA

2 OZ CRAN

1 OZ GREN

INSTRUCTIONS:

SHAKE STRAIN INTO MARTINI GLASS GARNISH WITH RASPBERRIES
